title: 11/17 Fantasy Football Podcast: Start or Sit (NFC); Is Big Ben Back?
description:
Covering the most important topic in sports: Sky cam (1:40)! Then our thoughts on TEN-PIT (3:45) and what the no-huddle offense could mean for Ben Roethlisberger. And is DeMarco Murray someone to sit now? ... An incredible stat about a terrible pass defense (12:30), Beat the Waiver Wire (16:15) for Week 12 and starting the No Touchdowns Club all over again (22:10) ... PHI-DAL (23:55), LAR-MIN (32:20), ATL-SEA (39:20), WAS-NO (48:30), KC-NYG (53:40), BAL-GB (58:04), DET-CHI (1:02:25) and some DFS lineups ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
